discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
In exam, Jun-22
On exam 27/4/22. Passed. I selected same answer

questions.question_text:
You manage a Dynamics 365 environment. Salespeople use a template from the Sales Hub to create quotes.
A member of the sales team requests that you change the order in which columns display in customer quotes.
You need to modify the quote template.
What should you use?

choices.A: Create a maximum of 10 child product families
choices.D: Set a product property as an option set
choices.C: Add the product to multiple product families
choices.B: Set a product bundle as a parent of a product family

questions.question_text:
You are a system customizer in Dynamics 365 Sales.
You need to set up product families.
Which option is available?

discussion.content: By eliminating A, B and C, the only one left is D. The problem is that I cannot see the logic. So I would say that the answer is correct.
Voting up D as the only one matching D365 CE logic

comments.content: Based on the docs, product can only have 1 parent product (be a family or a product).

discussion.content: C, because: 'You need to set up product families', create one or more families and associate one or more product to it.

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Sales.
You attempt to add a product to an order, but the product cannot be located.
You need to determine why the product is missing.
What is the cause?

choices.B: The product is missing required information
choices.D: The product was not listed in the quote
choices.C: The write-in option was not used

discussion.content:
A must be right.
"open the product, bundle, or family you want to publish, and on the command bar, select Publish. This will change the product status to Active and make it available for selling."

questions.question_text:
You are a Dynamics 365 Sales administrator for an organization.
The organization is no longer going to sell a product in the product catalog.
You need to ensure that the product is no longer available for selection by sales staff.
What should you do?

comments.content: Product Bundle - Product Bundle - Product Family
I second that. Bundles should be correct.

discussion.content: Would the first not be a product bundle?
Product Bundle - Product Bundle - Product Family: similar to one of previous questions in this paper (was Bundle-Bundle-Kit)

Product Bundle
Product Bundle
Product Family

comments.content:
The link supplied advises: 
Here are some things to know about bundles: You can mark certain products in a bundle as optional and sell them individually.
So should be: Bundle - Bundle - Family

discussion.content:
"A bundle is a collection of products that is sold as single unit." Therefore number 2 can't be bundle as they want to sell products from a grouping individually - has to be product family. Therefore the answer is:
Bundle - family - family
Why the 2nd one is not a Family? Don't get why would I need a bundle to sell items individually))

comments.content: You can add individual product from bundle but for family you need to sell them as a group.

I think it's exactly the other way around. You put similar products in a product family and sell them individually. A bundle is like a product but it contains other products. A bundle is sold as a whole.
I think too - 2nd one must be Family
You actually can't add Product Families to an opportunity :)

discussion.content:
1.bundle(allows to view bundle level and ind product level details, where as prod family /kit shows only kit level details) ,
2. bundle(allows ind prod sale from group) and 
3. prod family(kit/prod family allows nesting)
